autonomous_agent_apis.name: Microsoft Bot Framework
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Microsoft's comprehensive platform for building, deploying, and managing conversational AI bots across channels.
autonomous_agent_apis.rate_limits: 1000 calls/hour (Direct Line API); custom for enterprise

autonomous_agent_apis.name: IBM Watson Assistant
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Enterprise-grade conversational AI platform with advanced dialog, search, and orchestration capabilities.
autonomous_agent_apis.rate_limits: 1000 API calls/min (Lite); higher for paid plans

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Google Dialogflow
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Google's conversational AI platform for building chatbots, voicebots, and virtual agents.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: LangChain Agent Framework
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Open-source framework for building, orchestrating, and deploying LLM-powered agents and multi-agent workflows.
autonomous_agent_apis.authentication: Varies (API Key for hosted, none for local)

autonomous_agent_apis.name: AutoGen (Microsoft)
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Open-source multi-agent programming framework for building collaborative, autonomous AI agent systems.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Hippocratic AI
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Healthcare-specific generative AI agents focused on safety, compliance, and clinical workflows.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Thoughtful AI (Healthcare RCM Agents)
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Voice-enabled AI agents for healthcare revenue cycle management and automation.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: APIDNA
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Fintech-focused autonomous agent platform for secure, automated API integrations and workflow automation.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Chimoney API (Fintech Agent Wallets)
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Create agent wallets, automate payments, and multi-rail transactions through a simple API for fintech use cases.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Upsonic AI Agent Platform
autonomous_agent_apis.description: AI agent framework for automating fintech operations, including onboarding, risk, and compliance.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Prometeo API (Agentic Banking)
autonomous_agent_apis.description: API platform for agentic banking and fintech, enabling autonomous agents for account management and compliance.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Retell AI
autonomous_agent_apis.description: AI voice agent platform for phone call automation in retail and customer service.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Accelirate Retail AI Agents
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Retail-focused agent automation platform with APIs for inventory, CRM, and workflow automation.
